overview: Capturing the story of WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange with unprecedented access, director Laura Poitras finds herself caught between the motives and contradictions of Assange and his inner circle in a documentary portrait of power, betrayal, truth and sacrifice.
tagline: How much of your own life are you willing to risk
cast: Julian Assange|Sarah Harrison|Jacob Appelbaum|Joseph Farrell|Renata Avila
